title: Change Password
description: Enter your email address to receive a OTP to reset your password

error.minLengthPasswordError: Password must be at least 8 characters
error.maxLengthPasswordError: Password must be at most 15 characters
error.minLengthPasswordConfirmationError: Password confirmation must be at least 8 characters
error.maxLengthPasswordConfirmationError: Password confirmation must be at most 15 characters
error.passwordConfirmationError: Password confirmation does not match password
error.passwordRegexError: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
error.passwordSameAsOldError: New password must be different from the old password
